title: Circularity Attributes with Access Control
description: A set of attributes related to circularity with access control.

recyclability.description: Indicates whether the product is recyclable or not.

reusability.description: Indicates the level of reusability of the product.

repairability.description: Indicates the ease of repairing the product.

removability.description: Indicates the ease of removing components or materials for reuse or recycling.

recycled_content.description: Indicates the percentage of recycled content in the product.

roles.description: List of roles with access rights to the attributes.

identities.description: List of identities with access rights to the attributes.

access_rules.description: Access control rules defining which roles or identities have access to specific attributes.

recyclability.description: List of roles or identities with access to 'recyclability'.

reusability.description: List of roles or identities with access to 'reusability'.

repairability.description: List of roles or identities with access to 'repairability'.

removability.description: List of roles or identities with access to 'removability'.

recycled_content.description: List of roles or identities with access to 'recycled_content'.
